column4: This morning I had courier\postfix working perfectly on my system but its not working anymore i cant send pop\imap or login to my inbox I assume ubuntu forgot the Maildir thingy and thats why its no longer working  In telnet i get a ERR Maildir no such file or directory
how do i fix the problem??
I dont know probably the first thing i setup on the system was email and it worked straight after it was setup
well  what do the logs say
I am a noob I dont know what they say but telnet is saying Err Maildir No such file or directory
what are u useing to get the mail ?
what else do u have installed postfix ?  procmail
both of the configs seem to be need a system variable that i bleieve is Maildir I just think the Maildir variable has changed breaking the server
look at this url --> http://www.hypexr.org/linux_mail_server.php#procmail_install  skip all the pacman stuff

I believe the problem is with ubuntu not with my server.......... Like i said from the start Maildir is a variable.... That variable is screwed up if that variable changes back how it was earlier today it will just work I cant even smpt unix mainbox from the same machine like i could earlier (yes the smpt thing works)
